participant_abstract.sent: We came together and presented our individual findings and research.
We very easily reached consensus regarding the design and 'feel' of the remote.

participant_actions.sent: UID and ID - will make clay model.

participant_decisions.sent: decided on a smaller remote with a voice-activated locating device.
Decided on battery power (not sure yet if lithium or AAA).
decided on a hard plastic base with soft latex cover (covers will be changeable and sold separately).
Color: gunmetal grey with a small cut out for logo. decided on a chip capable of voice recognition.
Decided on the buttons - spongy feel, illuminated yellow.

participant_problems.sent: We were all in general agreement regarding the style.
Some issues were raised with the display of our company's logo.
